Module model.sfproject1
Package model.sfproject1

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
model.sfproject1.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
the Inventory class takes in parts and product objects and has the necessary properties and methods to manipulate said parts and products.
Author:
Luis Munguia Salas
